form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Certification Preparation Sheet And Oath Declaration, Form N-4(6/25/97)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 Department of Justice Certification Preparation Sheet Immigration and Naturalization Service And Oath Declaration A# 091 807 746 Daytime Phone# (949) 588-0973 NAME(changing to): MARIA BRAVO REYES FIRST MIDDLE LAST DOB: 02 B 12 SEX: F M/D/Y Height: 4 11 Marital Status: SINGLE FT. IN. Country of Former Nationality: NICARAGUA Name Change - Y or N(circle) (If yes, see attached name change form) Oath of Allegiance I HEREBY DECLARE, on oath, that I absolutely and entirely renounce and abjure all allegiance and fidelity to any foreign prince, potentate, state, or sovereignty of whom or which I have heretofore been a subject or citizen; that y will support and defend the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America against all enemies, foreign and domestic; that I will bear true faith and allegiance to the same; that will bear arms on behalf of the United States when required by the law; that I will perform noncombatant service in the Armed Forces of the United States when required by the law; that I will perform work of national importance under civilian direction when required by the law; and that ) take this obligation freely without any mental reservation or purpose of evasion; SO HELP ME GOD. In acknowledgment whereof I have hereunto affixed my signature. (MARIA BRAVO REYES) 9-28-98 Applicant's Signature (name change) Date WITNESSED BY-TEAMOS By bandra U.S. Government Printing Office 1957 -- 579-711/40102 Form N.649(6/25/97)
